description: In this session, I will demonstrate the same thing in Ruby, Perl, Python and Node - a simple backend API with a javascript front end. I will use appropriate libraries and idioms in each of the languages, with the goal of teaching attendees how to parse what's happening in code they are seeing, regardless of language.
title: PolyConf 16: Becoming a Polyglot - APIs in 4 Languages / Kirsten Hunter
